description: He made it to the 41st spot out of 600 participants and travels to China to work on his new album Hanyu Pinyin. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Singapore’s got talent: Shigga Shay was first S’porean contestant on reality show The Rap Of China
title_page: Singapore’s got talent: Shigga Shay was first S’porean contestant on reality show The Rap Of China | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Having made his name in the home-grown music scene in the last 17 years, Shigga Shay is now making the big leap to a much bigger market – China.
In May, the 31-year-old became the first Singaporean to take part in The Rap Of China 2024, the latest season of the popular Chinese reality show (2017 to present) that looks for the country’s next rap star.
